divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a friend were walking south on simcoe passing bruce street when we saw 3 lights in the sky south of us. i quickly pulled out my phone to take a pic, i got a pic of the triangle with a light at each point. the lights were white and it seemed like the object was changing direction and angle because one light disappeared then a second then finally the 3rd. he has video he recorded on his phone i will acquire when i see him next. we were both shocked. from seeing it to it dis a vanished took about 2 mins.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Oshawa
There were no other sightings in Oshawa on or around October 13th 2013
Summary: triangle with a white light at each point. seen south from simcoe and bruce
